title: Delivery Controller SDK
description: XenApp and XenDesktop provide an SDK based on a number of Microsoft Windows PowerShell version 3.0 snap-ins that allows you to perform the same tasks as you would with the Citrix Studio console, together with tasks you cannot do with Studio alone.

title: AppDNA SDK
description: Use the AppDNA SDK to embed AppDNA functionality within a familiar process or user interface, or to embed it within a simple webpage.

title: Citrix Receiver for HTML5 SDK
description: Use the Citrix Receiver for HTML5 SDK to enhance support for HDX sessions and to build a rich app experience in your Enterprise portals with the Receiver for HTML5.

title: PowerShell SDK
description: SDK documentation for the Citrix Powershell CMDLet reference
